warning: Are you sure you want to start fresh? All current analyses will be deleted and your CV/cover letter removed.
whatHappens: What happens when you start fresh:
deletedAnalyses: All current analyses will be deleted
removedDocs: Your CV and cover letter will be removed
cleanSlate: You'll start with a clean slate for your new job application
cvUnaffected: Your Uploaded CV will not be Affected
selectCvSubtitle: Choose a saved CV or upload a new one
